entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
